page.title: 06A typical day (cont.).
page.content: At twelve o'clock we have a twenty-five minute play and then we come in for lunch.I have science club after lunch.In science club we try out experiments on different things.We start school again at quarter past one.We may do some music and sing some of the songs we have been learning.We may do some English or maths or write a story.At three o'clock we pack up and our teacher reads us a story.We go home at quarter past three. At five o'clock I have dinner.After dinner I watch television.I watch the Â£Six O'clock News',Â£London Plus' and Â£Tomorrow's World'.At eight o'clock I go to bed.
